proof.th: ∃x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ ∃x. A x ∧ B x
∃x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ ∀a. A a ∧ B a ⟶ (∃x. A x) ∧ (∃x. B x)
A a ∧ B a ⊢ A a ∧ B a
A a ∧ B a ⊢ A a
A a ∧ B a ⊢ ∃a. A a
A a ∧ B a ⊢ B a
A a ∧ B a ⊢ ∃a. B a
∃x. A x ∧ B x, A a ∧ B a ⊢ (∃x. A x) ∧ (∃x. B x)
∃x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ ∀a. A a ∧ B a ⟶ (∃x. A x) ∧ (∃x. B x)
∃x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ (∃x. A x) ∧ (∃x. B x)
⊢ (∃x. A x ∧ B x) ⟶ (∃x. A x) ∧ (∃x. B x)

proof.th: ∀x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ ∀x. A x ∧ B x
∀x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ ∀x. A x
∀x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ A x ∧ B x
∀x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ A x
∀x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ ∀x. A x
∀x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ ∀x. B x
∀x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ A x ∧ B x
∀x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ B x
∀x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ ∀x. B x
∀x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ (∀x. A x) ∧ (∀x. B x)
⊢ (∀x. A x ∧ B x) ⟶ (∀x. A x) ∧ (∀x. B x)
